question: Choose all of the following statements that are true.

answers.answer: The order in which the different rules are presented is relevant.
answers.feedback: Correct - the pattern of the first rule is matched first.

answers.answer: The rule for LTE should come before the rule for LT.
We do not require rules for opening and closed brackets are lexed, as this is built into the lexer generator automatically.
answers.feedback: False - we require to also set up rules for brackets.

answers.answer: The rule | '*' { STAR } states that we match the input string on the regular expression '*' - and in this case, the next token is STAR.
